Class gui.EuclideSheetDisplay extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

serialVersionUID: 1L

Serialized Fields

sheet

model.EuclideSheet sheet

zoom

double zoom
Zoom level (same for x and y). zoom=1 means same scale, zoom<1 is zoom out, and zoom in is >1. Zoom equal to 0 means that zoom and position will be defined next time the paint method will be called.

pixelSnap

double pixelSnap
The distance, in pixels, for which the cursor is over a shape.

transform

java.awt.geom.AffineTransform transform
user to display transform

yToTop

boolean yToTop
Direction of the y axis: up or bottom of the page. Up: necessary for geometric Down: 'text', 'image'

displayOffset

math.geom2d.Point2D displayOffset

drawMargin

boolean drawMargin

clipping

EuclideSheetDisplay.Clip clipping

selection

java.util.ArrayList<E> selection
current selected shapes.
